SELECT MAX(tc.content_id) AS content_id, MAX(content) AS content, MAX(userid) AS userid, MAX(tc.reg_date) AS reg_date FROM TeamAComment tc, TeamAChangelog cl WHERE cl.content_id = tc.content_id AND cl.change_log_id = #{change_log_id}

SELECT rownum, cl.patch_log, cl.reg_date, cl.content_id, cl.version, cl.change_log_id FROM (SELECT content_id FROM TEAMACHANGELOG WHERE change_log_id = #{change_log_id} ) tcl, TeamAChangelog cl WHERE cl.content_id = tcl.content_id AND rownum < 6

SELECT DISTINCT cl.content_id, rownum, ct.media2, cl.patch_log, ct.title, cl.reg_date, cl.change_log_id FROM (SELECT content_id FROM TEAMACHANGELOG WHERE change_log_id = #{change_log_id} ) tcl, TeamACreaterContent ct, TeamAChangelog cl WHERE cl.content_id = ct.content_id AND ct.content_id != tcl.content_id AND rownum < 6 ORDER BY content_id
